title: Path of the Midnight Sun
content:
Protect a noblewoman reckoning with unholy powers as she wards off the soul of the Demon King sealed inside her. Doubt your own companions, survive against unforgiving hordes of monsters. But beware; every choice has consequences in this epic JRPG adventure of betrayal, romance & self-acceptance. Communication and relationships are the key to success in this sprawling world, as your standing with them directly affects your companions' ability to battle. Put your skills to the ultimate test in Hardcore Mode, or immerse yourself in the world of Path of the Midnight Sun without any stress in Story Mode.

Publisher: Studio Daimon

Release Date: Jan 10, 2023
